Package suga.engine.graphics

Interface DrawListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
Menu
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicGameObject, BasicMenu
public interface DrawListener
A DrawListener is registered with a Graphics system and called on every frame to check if something needs to be drawn.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    DrawListener.Priorities
    The priorities that a drawing listener can be called at.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    applyChanges(int width, int height, GraphicsPanel panel)
    Called every drawing frame so programs have a chance to make their voices heard on what gets drawn.

  • Method Details

    • applyChanges

      void applyChanges(int width, int height, GraphicsPanel panel)
      Called every drawing frame so programs have a chance to make their voices heard on what gets drawn.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the pixel map.
      height - The height of the pixel map.
      panel - The panel to apply changes to.
